title: Chiefs (Recognition) (No. 4) Order, 2013
content:
7th March, 2013 Statutory Instruments 91
GOVERNMENT OF ZAMBIA
STATUTORY INSTRUMENT No. 24 OF 2013
ThCeh ieAfcst
(Laws, Volume 16, Cap. 287)
TheC hie(fRse cog(nNiot4.i)O o rnd)e2 r0,1 3
WHEREAS the President is satisfied that the person named in the
Schedule to this Order is entitled to hold the office specified therein
as required by subsection (2) of section three of the Chiefs Act:
Now THEREFORE, in exercise of the powers contained in section
three of the Chiefs Act, the following Order is hereby made:
1. This Order may be cited as the Chiefs (Recognition)
Title
(No. 4) Order, 2013.
2. The person named in the Schedule to this Order is hereby
Recognition
recognised as being, within the area in Zambia described in the ofC hief
Schedule, the holder of the office specified in the Schedule.
